bungalow.title: Bungalow
bungalow.description: A small house with a single storey

detached.title: Detached House
detached.description: A house that is not connected to any other houses

link-detached.title: Link-Detached House
link-detached.description: A house that is connected to another house by a garage or other non-living area

maisonette.title: Maisonette
maisonette.description: A residential dwelling, split over two floors with private external entrances rather than a communal entrance

semi-detached.title: Semi-Detached House
semi-detached.description: A house that is attached to another house on one side

terrace.title: Row of Terraced Houses
terrace.description: A row of houses that are attached to each other in a line

terraced.title: Terraced House
terraced.description: Individual house in a row of terraced houses
